comments.body: Side note, it still read awkward (to me) to have to use a double dereference ('*' and '->') ...

Is it intentionally an EQ (i.e. do we want to check/test for the lack of floating point inaccuracy/difference), if so, we ought to add a comment (to avoid a later 'helpful' tool warning about the instability of the double equality) and/or did you mean to use EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ?
